Articles.Content:
The asteroids! The asteroids are everywhere!

Ever since the tracking station started picking up asteroids, there has been mass-hysteria and panic all over Kerbin! The Plus One Space Program has been brought in to assess the danger and if necessary, nudge dangerous asteroids out of the way. The panic has been so bad that Kerasian Space Agency, under investigation for a "poor safety record" from the previous season, has also been tasked to this mission.

Current Episode: Episode 5 - We Have a Winner! And Kerbals Everywhere Should Build Shelters...

The full

Kerasian Space Agency Wins!!!!

Edited August 1, 2014 by KerasianSpaceAgency
Updates

In episode 1, the Plus One Space Program and the Kerasian Space Agency get re-acclimated to the launch center and notice some new toys! The first step of planning any mission? Find the largest rockets you have and hit spacebar!

The Plus One Space Program's Bruce Willis project failed so hard, Kerbal Space Program crashed! The Kerasian Space Agency launches their ambitious prototype with a space plane return vehicle. But this seems overly ambitious for a program renowned for "losing" Jebadiah Kerman...

The Plus One Space Program gets off the ground, but also gets out of Kerbin's sphere of influence and accidentally ejects itself out of range. Meanwhile, forgetfulness leads to some KSA's attempts turning into spectacular kerestrial fireworks displays costing taxpayers millions of Kredits. Kerbals should just let the asteroid hit at this point...

The Plus One Space Program loses Jeb to space. And Bill looks to be next! Meanwhile, KSA is getting closer and closer with their monstrosity of a rocket. But at least this time they haven't killed in Kerbal icons!

Plus One continues to suffer from glitches and failures in their stages! They throw in the towel! The Kerasian Space Agency is the victor!

Watch the finale here!

Episode 5 - We Have a Winner! And Kerbals Everywhere Should Build Shelters...
